title: 24 hour RP Purchase Error Rito Pls
body:
Ok so I wanted to buy some Rp and I got this message:
> You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours and try again later. I thought it was nothing so I tried again 2 days later. 

Same error. I sent a support ticket got the automated email saying I was in the wait list etc. I'm getting really annoyed because I want them skins that are on sale.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you received a reply to your ticket yet? Can you provide me your ticket number?
Yes I have had a reply and they asked for what I payed with (visa credit card). Here is the ticket number #21953696.
All good then, please continue to answer any questions the support rep asks of you. Remember, you've got until the 23rd until your shop disappears so don't worry :)
